name: Narayan Paul
bio: Aspiring software engineer and B.Tech CSE student at NIT Durgapur (CGPA 9.4), with a strong foundation in full‑stack web development and machine learning. Passionate about building scalable products and solving real‑world problems.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

projects.name: VeloRide – Uber‑inspired Ride Booking Web App
projects.description: Full‑stack MERN ride booking app with authentication, driver‑rider matching and real‑time communication.

projects.name: Anemia Detection from Hand Video
projects.description: Deep learning pipeline to estimate hemoglobin (Hb) from palm video using histogram correlation and ViT+LSTM.

projects.name: Cat vs Dog Image Classification
projects.description: CNN model trained on Kaggle Dogs vs Cats with augmentation and dropout.

projects.name: Weather Forecast Web App
projects.description: Weather app using OpenWeather API with a clean, responsive UI.

projects.name: Quine‑McCluskey Boolean Minimization
projects.description: Python implementation with prime implicant chart and logic simplification.

projects.name: Vehicle Handling System (SQL)
projects.description: Structured database to manage vehicle records, service history, and compliance data.
